data.name: ACID Music Studio 11 Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
Dynamic action scenes, impressive space battles and gripping multiplayer experiences – create the right sound for your gaming adventures to add excitement and tension. ACID Music Studio 11 Steam Edition has everything you need for the task: Epic instruments, 2,500 ACIDized sound loops and effects.

Make your own music. In your own music studio.
It's easy and you don't even need experience or be able to read music. Start out with a few loops and then just add instruments and effects as you go. You can create your own music for videos, as well as create songs in music genres like hip-hop, house and rock. The program also lets you create and edit voice-overs. There's no limit to the creative possibilities – all content can be modified any way you want. Plus, new 64-bit power delivers maximum program performance for recording, editing and mixing tasks.

Everything's included
Play 8 virtual instruments such as an electric piano or an original drum machine. Choose from over 2,500 freely adjustable loops and 6 effect plug-ins such as a roaring guitar amp. It's the complete solution for each and every one of your creative ideas – for film music, your own songs, or for remixing your favorite tracks.

Highlights
• Easy, loop-based music production
• New! Includes 2,500+ freely customizable ACIDized loops
• New! Includes 8 virtual instruments + 6 effects plug-ins
• New! 64-bit support for complete creative freedom
• Premium remixing tools

data.short_description: Produce breathtaking sound for breathtaking videos. ACID Music Studio 11 Steam Edition is the perfect tool for loop-based music creation in studio quality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: For Microsoft Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: 500 MB for program installation, 6 GB for included instruments and loops
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: For Microsoft Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor with 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy ACID Music Studio 11 Steam Edition
